0101001110110100 0010001110000001 1 -> sum: 0111011100110110, cout: 0
0011101010000001 0111100000101101 0 -> sum: 1011001010101110, cout: 0
0011101111110001 1111000110111000 0 -> sum: 0010110110101001, cout: 1

0001001101100010 1111011110001100 1 -> sum: 0000101011101111, cout: 1
1110000010010101 1001011111100100 1 -> sum: 0111100001111010, cout: 1
